mapper.select:
select * from xhgmnet_radiouseria where 1=1
and id like concat(#{id},'%')
and name like concat(#{name},'%')
order by id asc limit #{start},#{limit}

select count(*) from xhgmnet_radiouseria where 1=1
and id like concat(#{id},'%')
and name like concat(#{name},'%')
mapper.sql: id, name, priorityLevel, bicType, bocType, time
mapper.insert:
insert into xhgmnet_radiouseria
id,
name,
priorityLevel,
bicType,
bocType,
time,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{prioritylevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{bictype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{boctype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update xhgmnet_radiouseria
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
priorityLevel = #{prioritylevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bicType = #{bictype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bocType = #{boctype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update xhgmnet_radiouseria set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, priorityLevel = #{prioritylevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bicType = #{bictype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bocType = #{boctype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
